channel.title: Shooting 2 on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shooting 2 on Game6r

item.title: Soldiers 2 - Desert Storm
item.description: According to the terms of the shooting game Strike Force Heroes 2, you will find 15 levels united by a common storyline. During the passage of missions, you will have to manage a whole team of specially trained fighters, called a shock squad. These guys are able to perform any difficult tasks and single-handedly destroy an entire army of opponents. Each of the characters has original abilities. Strike Force 2 includes a Medic who is able to heal the wounds of other team members, and a Sniper who easily destroys the enemy at long distances.

item.title: Stickman Fugitive
item.description: In this game, the view is from above, and the creators didn’t bother much about how the characters look. But all the shortcomings are compensated by brutal bloody skirmishes and a chic arsenal of weapons. Of course, he is not immediately available to the main character. First you have to run with a gun. Other weapons either drop from enemies, or can be bought right in the process of passing.
